name: Verify Manager can purchase organization credits with predefined value
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can purchase credits using predefined value(10, 100, 1000).
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role.

Verify that:

  • Manager can purchase credits using predefined value(10, 100, 1000).

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can purchase credits using predefined value(10, 100, 1000).
